data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Olmi, Massimo, Copeland, Robert S., Noort, Simon Van (2019): Dryinidae of the Afrotropical region (Hymenoptera, Chrysidoidea). Zootaxa 4630 (1): 1-619, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4630.1.1|3,446 occurrences
